text: Iosif "Sifis" Valirakis (, 12 March 1943 – 24 January 2021) was a Greek politician. He was a member of the Panhellenic Socialist Movement (PASOK). Valirakis was born in Chania, Crete. From 1995 to 1996, he was Minister of Public Order. On 24 January 2021, Valirakis fell out of a boat and drowned near Eretria, Greece, aged 78.Σήφης Βαλυράκης: Εντοπίστηκε νεκρός στον Ευβοϊκό Κόλπο ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Greek politicians Category:Accidental deaths by drowning
title: Sifis Valirakis
